page.title: 09Working Concerns
page.content: The only working concerns in the area centre around hotels, restaurants and cafes directly connected with{tourism. The very mild climate in the area has led to numerous{Nursing homes}being built or converted. Many are small private homes dealing with geriatric patients suffering from various disabilities.There are two Local Council homes. The stone farm buildings of the Old Park Estate in St. Lawrence have been converted into a craft{glass-works. Here the public can view for themselves in the actual working conditions the manufacture of glassware. The wares themselves are of decorative and ornamental nature as opposed to functional. There is also in existence{cottage crafts}where objects such as garden gnomes are sold direct from private houses.
